activeTabDesc.message: Click the extension icon to find the active Meet tab

attendanceDesc.message: Capture the attendance of the meet and export to a CSV

autoAdmitDesc.message: Automatically admits new entrants to the Meet

autoFullScreenDesc.message: Auto go full screen when someone is presenting

autoJoinDescOption.message: Join meeting only when participants are present

autoMinimizeDesc.message: Auto-minimize your video when you join a meet

autoRecordDesc.message: Automatically start recording the Meet (Google Workspace required)

autoRejectDesc.message: Automatically denies new entrants to the Meet

autoUnmuteDesc.message: Stop others from muting your mic

autoVideoDesc.message: Set video to turn off on join

bgColorDesc.message: Set custom background color in the Meet

chimesDesc.message: Always hear chime sounds when participants join and leave, or a when a new chat message is received

copyUrlDesc.message: Automatically copy Meet URL to clipboard

desktopDesc.message: Make all Google Cal links open in the

desktopLabel.message: Open Meet links in desktop app

displayClockDesc.message: Display the clock even when not in fullscreen

doNotDisturbCommentsDesc.message: Hide comments and user join pop-ups

doNotDisturbDesc.message: Hide new comment & new participant join popups

emojiToolTipDesc.message: This feature is on by default and you can access it from the chat window in Google Meet

extDesc.message: 40 new features for Google Meet such as mute all, remove all, auto admit, emojis, mirror videos, background color, and push to talk!

generalToolTipDesc.message: This feature is on by default and you can access it from the participants menu in Google Meet

hideAddOthersDesc.message: Hides the 'Add Others' pop-up when joining a Meet

hideTopBarDesc.message: Hide the top bar when the bottom bar disappears

ignorePresentationModalDesc.message: Auto hide `infinity mirror' alert when presenting

leaveConfirmDesc.message: Ask to confirm when you leave a meeting

meetProSectionDesc.message: By upgrading to Meet Pro you get access to over 25 new features that take Google Meet to the next level.

meetVolumeDesc.message: Adjust the volume level of the Meet

mirrorVideosDesc.message: Mirrors all videos in the Meet

muteAllDesc.message: Mute all participants via the participants menu

mutePopupDesc.message: Hides 'Are you speaking?' popup when muted

pinBarDesc.message: Pins the control bar to the bottom of the screen

pinChatDesc.message: Automatically pins chat view when joining Meet

pipDesc.message: View a participants video in picture-in-picture

pttUpgrade.message: Upgrade to Pro to set your own key binding

quickEmojiDesc.message: Adds quick emoji shortcuts to the chat window

quickLeaveDesc.message: Use hotkey to leave a call

removeAllDesc.message: Remove all participants via the participants menu

returnHomeDesc.message: Returns to Meet home screen after leaving a Meet

returnHomeLabel.message: Return to home screen on hangup

seeFeatures.message: to see all the features we have planned

sortParticipantsDesc.message: Adds toggle to the participant list to sort by last name

speakerBorderDesc.message: Adds a border around speaking participants

timerDesc.message: Displays a meeting timer in bottom tab bar

toggleBarDesc.message: Toggle the bottom control bar to appear
